analysis.description:
Pixiu_Beta.get_exchange_wei (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#358-383) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- Pixiu_Beta.tokenExchangeRateInWei

ERC20Basic (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#56-63) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#58)

ERC20 (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#66-75) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#68-69)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#69)

BasicToken (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#75-111) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#91-98)

StandardToken (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#119-172) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#126-139)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#145-156)

Pixiu_Beta (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#172-586) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#524-538)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#538-566)

Pixiu_Beta.get_exchange_wei (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#358-383) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- nowTime >= time1 && nowTime <= time2 (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#376-380)

Pixiu_Beta.INITIAL_SUPPLY should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#204-206)
Pixiu_Beta.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#174)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.9 (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/21/0x53344c813fbc35890a7304187dc920358b5acf4a.sol#108) is not in mixedCase
